sentence.Network_en: They were smart but not showy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们衣着讲究但不惹眼。

sentence.Network_en: The clothes were very showy, very theatrical.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些衣服很艳丽很华美，像戏装一样。

sentence.Network_en: Her dress was too showy for such a formal occasion.
sentence.Network_cn: 在如此正式的场合,她的服装过分华丽了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 四月二十五日生日花：豪华郁金香（clarimond tulip）花语：华丽（showy）像豪华郁金香这麽丽的花恐怕很少吧？不吧？--------------- …
郁金香在英语世界代表炫耀(showy)钦佩(greatly admired)或其他更多意义，如果翻译者认为原作有郁、金、香的涵义，翻译时可在花 …
花字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 花蕾〖 flowerbud〗 花里胡哨〖 showy;gaudy;garish〗 花柳〖 flowersandwillows〗.
浮世绘... ... 浮动直条图 floating column chart 浮华 ostentatious;showy;pretentious 浮滥 exorbitant;excessively;excessive.

list.abs: a perennial herb climbing by means of tendrils attips having showy yellow to red or purple flowers ;靠叶尖的卷须来攀援的一种草本植物，具有艳丽的黄色至红色或紫色花朵；
bulbous plant having showy white to reddish flowers ., 具有艳丽的白色至微红色花朵的球茎状植物.
iris native to Japan having large showy flowers ., 原产于日本的一种鸢尾 , 具有大的艳丽的花.
Old World perennial plants grown for their showy flowers ., 旧大陆中因其艳丽花朵而种植的一个多年生植物属.
a water lily having large leaves and showy fragrant flowers that float on water ;, 漂浮在水上的一种具有大叶和艳丽的芳香花朵的睡莲;

entry.tran: 艳丽的;花哨的;显眼的;引人注目的
entry.def: Something that is showy is very noticeable because it is large, colourful, or bright.

example.ex: Since he was color blind, he favored large, showy flowers...
example.tran: 因为他是色盲，所以他喜爱大朵艳丽的花。

example.ex: They were smart but not showy.
example.tran: 他们衣着讲究但不惹眼。

means.word_mean: 4. (used especially of clothes) marked by conspicuous display

auth_sentence.content: Sparkly, yes, but never vulgar or too showy.
